description:
runtime: don't mark the new call trampolines as NOSPLIT.
They may call other NOSPLIT routines, and that might
overflow the stack.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://khr%40golang.org@code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=1cffbb7333ec ***

runtime: don't mark the new call trampolines as NOSPLIT.
They may call other NOSPLIT routines, and that might
overflow the stack.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/12563043

subject: code review 12563043: runtime: don't mark the new call trampolines as NOSPLIT.
